summary: Comprehensive testing of Trading AI System completed. All 20 backend API tests passed (100% success rate). Frontend UI testing successful with all features working correctly including Auto-Execute, AI Analysis, Signal Parser, Trade Execution, Telegram Bot, Channel Monitor, and Notifications.

minor.issue: Console warning about hydration error in AICenter.jsx select component - HTML validation issue with span inside option

issues: Console hydration warning about span inside select/option - cosmetic HTML validation issue
Chart warning about width/height -1 when container not properly sized - charts display 'No data available' message

passed_tests: Auto-Execute Status API - GET /api/auto-execute/status returns enabled=true, use_binance=false (Paper Trading)
Auto-Execute Config API - PUT /api/auto-execute/config toggles use_binance correctly
Signal Parser - Telegram Signal Format (Evening Trader) parses correctly with asset, action, entry, SL, TPs, leverage
AI Signal Analyse - POST /api/ai/analyze-signal returns score and should_execute
Trade Execution - POST /api/trades/execute creates trade successfully
Telegram Bot Status - GET /api/telegram/bot/status shows running=true
Channel Monitor Status - GET /api/telegram/channels/status shows running=true with 2 channels (Evening Trader, Fat Pig Signals)
Notifications - Test Notification sent successfully to chat_id 8202282349
Dashboard UI - Shows Open Positions and Pending Signals correctly
AI Center UI - Shows Auto-Execute Controls, Paper/Binance Toggle, AI Score settings
Portfolio API - Returns balance and statistics
Known Channels - Returns channel list with Evening Trader, Fat Pig Signals
Influential Accounts - Returns list of monitored social accounts
critical_code_review_comments: AICenter.jsx line 268-276: HTML validation issue - using native select with options inside a React component creates hydration warnings. Consider using shadcn Select component instead.
Minor: Portfolio charts show 'No data available' when chart container dimensions are -1. Add minWidth/minHeight or handle edge case.
seed_data_creation: Created test signal TEST_LINK/USDT and executed trade for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features are working: Auto-Execute enabled with Paper Trading mode, Telegram Bot running (traiding_r2d2_bot), Channel Monitor authorized and monitoring Evening Trader + Fat Pig Signals, AI Analyzer available with GPT-4o, Notifications working. Binance Keys are invalid so Paper Trading is used. 1 open position (TEST_LINK/USDT) and 2 pending signals (ETH/USDT, SOL/USDT).

verified_features.signal_parser: Working - Evening Trader format parsed correctly
verified_features.trade_execution: Working - Creates trades via paper trading
